name: @daneroo/qcic-status
description: Static published repository of latest status json files
author: Daniel Lauzon <daniel.lauzon@gmail.com>

scripts.cron: while true; do npm start; npm run deploy; echo; echo done $(date); sleep 600; done
scripts.deploy: cp now.json dist/ && cd dist && time now --public --target production && now rm --safe --yes status-qcic
scripts.testWithAuditLater: npm run lint && npm audit && npm run unit
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit && echo '***' && echo Run npm audit yourself... && echo '***'
